name: Raging Pirates
description:
Raging Pirates is a multiplayer arena shooter from Arko Games. Dominate the seas with your choice of four colourful captains! Sink your friends! Slaughter the Kraken!

***

Up to four controllers are supported, as are the keyboard controls ASD and arrows LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT. Pause the game with P and activate fullscreen mode with F.

***

Arko Games are a group of students aged 8-11 with additional needs from Oakfield Primary School on the Isle of Wight. They made Raging Pirates with guidance from their teacher, Mr Williams, working on everything from sound design to coding. The only parts of the game which are not their own work are the character art (drawn by Carlo Tartaglia following a detailed brief from the students) and the theme music (composed by Gavin Inglis, again following suggestions from the students).

Thanks to Carlo, Gavin, Mr Noall, Mr Baldwin and all the students and staff in Squirrels' Den!

***

All profits from the game will be split with half going to buy equipment to help the students make more games and half to local charities.
